Mininova versionens installshield första bild: Welcome to the InstallShield Wizard for Prey Demo :), och ingen autostart.inf i roten utav iso filen, låter knappast som en retail då.
Men rent krasst så är PREY11.CAB filen i MDAtje releasen enbart 1.18 GB mot totalt 1.75 GB utav samtliga pk4 filer i tRANce6 release, men jag håller mig sålänge till min.
har läst att folk klarat spelet på runt 4-5 timmar ? vafan half life episode 1 som är en expansion bara tog mig lite över 4 timmar.
swebarb: Detta spelet tog 10 år att göra, och om det är sant, att många klarat spelet på 4 timmar, borde de som gjort spelet SKÄMMAS!

Spelets tillverkning påbörjades för ca. 10 år sedan, men fick läggas på is. Dom återupptog tillverkningen för några år sedan.
Så rent krasst så har det inte tagit 10 år att skapa spelet, men det påbörjades för ca. 10 år sedan.

This game is awesome. It doesn't require all that much from the hardware either. Once you play this, you'll come to see it's not quite like other games! :D What I loved extra much was the "intro" journey after you get sucked up into the mothership. It felt as if I was there.
some1 doesnt understand how to input "crack" write to me and i explane.
how many GBs use this game after instalation?

This game atleast feels like a whole game, not a beta which is claimed in a previous comment. Although, it's curious that it says version 0.2.99 in the console.
I finished it in about 8 hours, and I'm an experienced gamer.
There are things that reminds of Doom 3 and Quake 4, but it's not the same game. It still has much "kill the enemies and go to next section", but it does it much better because of it's great story.
I get the feeling it's running faster than both D3 and Q4, and some levels are just HUGE.
All in all, I give it a 3/5, because of the new things (spiritwalk, wallwalk etc.) and the story, but not more since its to repetitive for my taste.

I think it's incredible how people don't read the other comments. Had you read them, LINEBACKER_2, you'd have found out which file it is a long time ago.

to crack open the hosts file in the directory listed then under the localhosts listing in that file add
127.0.0.1       preymaster.humanhead.com

the file is smaller that the retail version because this file is from the gold version that is sent to the publishers for the protection software to be written into the file before being sent to the manufacturers to make the retail version.
